name: Dino Frenzy
description:
Description

Dino Frenzy is a 2D Pixel Endless game where a dinosaur (player) needs to dodge continuously falling meteors to save himself from getting killed. By using accelerometer controls, the player will tilt its device to move around the dinosaur horizontally to avoid falling meteors, otherwise the dinosaur will die and game over. The setup of the game will be a standard vertical setup like other mobile games.

Controls:
  1. Tilt - Move Sideways.
Developers:

Piolo Ambion

Richelle Cagoco

Klyde Topino

Gabriella Vilallva

Kalvin Vertucio
